item.title: Adam Williams
item.description: About me I am currently a software engineer developing localization algorithms for autonomous vehicles, and I am generally interested in developing mathematically principled approaches to estimation problems. My primary areas of expertise center around estimation and optimization on manfolds, and particularly on Lie groups. I did my undergraduate and Master’s studies at CMU in the Department of Mathematical Sciences, and have been working in the software industry (primarily robotics) since.
